biospec_descr.textblock:
Citrated plasma is collected at each study visit and stored at a central lab for future
      assessment of changes in plasma markers of thrombosis and fibrinolysis.

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to find out if starting anti-retroviral therapy (ART) above 500
      cluster-of-differentiation-4 (CD4)+ cells/milliliter (mL) ('early ART group') is better at
      reducing the stiffness of arteries than waiting to start ART until the CD4+ drops below 350
      cells/mL ('deferred ART group').  Artery stiffness has been associated with an increased
      risk of cardiovascular (heart) disease, and could be useful as an earlier indicator of heart
      disease. In this study, the stiffness of arteries will be measured at study entry, months 4,
      8, 12, and annually thereafter, using a tonometer on the participant's forearm.

clinical_study.brief_title: Arterial Elasticity: A Substudy of Strategic Timing of AntiRetroviral Treatment (START)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Simultaneous co-enrollment in the START study

          -  Signed informed consent

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Inability to ascertain waveform measurements that can be analyzed, i.e. atrial
             fibrillation

study_pop.textblock:
Enrollees are HIV-positive, antiretroviral-naive individuals with CD4+ > 500 cells/mL
        randomized to the START trial.

link.description: INSIGHT network website, including information on the START Arterial Elasticity Substudy

clinical_study.official_title: Arterial Elasticity: A Substudy of Strategic Timing of AntiRetroviral Treatment (START)

primary_outcome.description: Large artery elasticity is measured using a tonometer placed on the forearm.
primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in large artery elasticity (LAE

primary_outcome.description: Small artery elasticity is measured using a tonometer placed on the forearm.
primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in small artery elasticity (SAE)

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in plasma markers of thrombosis and fibrinolysis
